meanings.definition: A large herbivorous dinosaur of the genus Iguanodon.
meanings.sent1: The iguanodons roamed the ancient forests searching for plants to eat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of iguanodons to learn more about prehistoric life.
meanings.sent3: The iguanodons had a picnic in the park, munching on leaves and ferns.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, the skeleton of an iguanodons stood tall, a reminder of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the lifelike model of iguanodons in the exhibit.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of iguanodons at the dinosaur exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed the iguanodons' footprints found in the valley.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the iguanodons danced together in a synchronized routine.
meanings.sent4: The iguanodons in the painting seemed to come alive, their eyes following you.
meanings.sent5: Visitors were amazed by the size of the iguanodons on the mural.
